sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Grafico from "./App copy" function CdbInput() { const [investimentos, setInvestimentos] = useState({ cdb1: 0, cdb2: 0, cdb3: 0 }); const handleInputChange = (event, cdbName) => { const { value } = event.target; setInvestimentos(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [cdbName]: value })); }; return (
handleInputChange(event, 'cdb1')} placeholder="R$ 00.00" className='valores' />

handleInputChange(event, 'cdb2')} placeholder="R$ 00.00" className='valores' />

handleInputChange(event, 'cdb3')} placeholder="R$ 00.00" className='valores' />
); } export default CdbInput;
